title: Spicy Grilled Boneless Pork Chops
directions: 1combine all ingredients together, pour over Pork chops and marinade at least 30 mins ( longer if you want)

2on high-med heat grill about 5 mins each side ( or pan sear)pork should be cooked through but not over cooked.
set a aside and let rest a few minutes...then slice thinly and serve with your favorite sauce and side...a perfect touch is sauteed onions and garlic.
